result.html: Bhí mé tinn innéI was sick yesterday.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé tinn innéI was sick yesterday.

result.html: D'imir mé cispheil innéI played basketball yesterday.
result.ponchtml: D'imir mé cisṗeil innéI played basketball yesterday.

result.html: Domhnach a bhí ann innéYesterday was Sunday.
result.ponchtml: Doṁnaċ a ḃí ann innéYesterday was Sunday.

result.html: Seoladh an leabhar innéThe book was launched yesterday.
result.ponchtml: Seolaḋ an leaḃar innéThe book was launched yesterday.

result.html: Tháinig mé innéI arrived yesterday.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig mé innéI arrived yesterday.

result.eng: Susan and Tadhg went to the cinema yesterday.
result.ga: Chuaigh Susan agus Tadhg go dtí an phictiúrlann inné
result.orig: Chuaigh Susan agus Tadhg go dtí an phictiúrlann inné
result.html: Chuaigh Susan agus Tadhg go dtí an phictiúrlann innéSusan and Tadhg went to the cinema yesterday.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ Susan agus Taḋg go dtí an ṗictiúrlann innéSusan and Tadhg went to the cinema yesterday.
